SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Call<P extends Serializable>
Call is a record that contains the parameters, the service and the id of the remote function.
Card
Immutable class to hold information about a card.
Card.Type
 
CardsDeck
Class to handle the game's deck of cards.
CardSelect
CardSelect class is used to send the selected cards from the client to the server.
Cell
Record that holds information about a cell: coordinates and card type This object is used to check personal objectives.
CLI
Singleton class that handles the CLI functions To run the CLI do: `CLI cli = CLI.getInstance();` `cli.run();`
Client
 
Client
Class to represent a client connected to the server via rmi.
Client
Class to represent a client connected to the server via socket.
ClientAlreadyConnectedException
ClientAlreadyConnectedException is used to throw an exception when a client is already connected to the server.
ClientAlreadyIdentifiedException
Exception thrown when a client tries to identify itself but is already identified.
ClientConnectedButNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a client was connected but not found anymore at reconnection
ClientInterface
Interface for the client object used in the server to handle communication with the client
ClientManager
Class to manage the clients connected to the server via rmi.
ClientManager
Class that handles the networking part for the client towards the server, server-side
ClientManagerInterface
Interface for the ClientManager object used in the server to handle a group of clients that use the same technology
ClientNeverConnectedException
ClientNeverConnectedException is used to throw an exception when requesting a client that never connected to the server.
ClientNotConnectedException
Exception thrown when a game is started with a disconnected client in lobby, or when trying to send a message to a disconnected client.
ClientNotFoundException
ClientNeverConnectedException is used to throw an exception when a client is never connected to the server.
ClientNotIdentifiedException
ClientNotIdentifiedException is used to throw an exception when a client has not identified itself to the server.
ClientService
RMI service that is exposed to the client
ClientStatus
Enum for the status of the client.
ClientStatusHandler
Class for handling the status of the client.
CLIGame
Class that contains the game's information needed in the CLI
Cockade
Record that holds information about an awarded cockade: name and points
CommonObjController
Controller class for the common objectives scene showing the two common objectives.
CommonObjective
Class to handle the common objectives It contains the name and the current value of the objective, plus a set of the people having completed the objective.
ConnectionModeOptions
Options to ask the connection method
CreateLobbyController
CreateLobbyController is the class that manages the "create lobby" scene.
DataBase
A minimal db to associate a set of players to their save file.
DisconnectedClientException
DisconnectedClientException is used to throw an exception when a client is disconnected from the server.
EndController
This class is the controller for the End.fxml file.
Function<P extends Serializable,R extends Serializable>
Function class used in the client to represent a remote function call.
Game
Class to represent a game.
GameController
This class runs an instance of game and controls it.
GameData
This class contains all the data needed to update the GUI.
GameInfo
GameInfo class is used to send the game information from the server to the clients.
GameNotFoundException
Exception thrown when someone tries to load a non-existing game
GamePausedException
Exception thrown when an action is made while the game is paused.
GameViewController
Class that handles a new instance of game.
GlobalClientManager
Singleton class that holds the client manager for both RMI and RPC
IdentityTheftException
Exception thrown if a player tries to send a message with a different name than his own as the sender.
InGameOptions
Options to ask what to do during the game
InLobbyOptions
Options to ask what to do in the lobby
InvalidMoveException
Exception thrown when a player attempts to make an invalid move
InvalidUsernameException
Exception thrown when the username is either too long, empty or contains a reserved keyword
Lobby
Class to handle lobby operations It contains the lobby name and the list of players' names.
LobbyAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when someone tries to create a lobby with a name that already exists
LobbyController
Singleton class to handle all the lobbies
LobbyCreateInfo
LobbyCreateInfo class is used to send the lobby information from the client to the server to create a new lobby.
LobbyFullException
Exception thrown when someone tries to join a full lobby
LobbyNotFoundException
Exception thrown when someone tries to join a non-existing lobby
LobbyViewController
Class that represents the controller of the lobby scene.
Login
Login class is used to send the login info from the client to the server.
LoginController
LoginController is the class that manages the login scene.
LoginService
RMI interface for login service
Main
Class that manages the initialization of the GUI
MainMenuController
MainMenuController is the class that manages the main menu scene.
Message
Message class is used to send messages between clients.
MessageReturnToLoginController
class controller for the scene shown in case the server is stopped
MessageStoppedGameController
class controller for the scene shown in case the host of a game decides to stop the game
MessageTooLongException
Exception thrown when a player tries to send a message that is too long.
NetworkManager
Class that handles the server-client communications, server-side
NetworkManager
Class that handles the networking server-client, server-side
NetworkManagerInterface
Interface for the network manager object that handles all communication with the server
NonBlockingIO
Singleton class to handle non-blocking IO for the CLI.
NotEnoughPlayersException
Exception thrown when the host tries to start a game when he is alone in the lobby
NotHostException
Exception thrown when a player, that is not the lobby's host.
NotYourTurnException
Exception thrown when a player tries to make a move when it is not his turn.
Objective
Abstract class that represents an objective
OptionsInterface
Interface for the options enumerators
PersonalObjController
PersonalObjController is the class that manages the personal objective scene.
PersonalObjective
Immutable class to handle the personal objectives It contains the name and the position of the cards to check for completion.
Player
Class that holds the information about a player.
PlayerAlreadyInLobbyException
Exception thrown when someone tries to join a lobby where he is already in If this exception is thrown, it is an indicator of a bug.
PlayerIterator
Iterator to track the current player in the game.
PlayerNotInLobbyException
Exception thrown when someone tries to leave a lobby that he is not in If this exception is thrown, it is an indicator of a bug.
Point
Record that holds information about a point: coordinates It is used to check if card selection is valid
Result<T extends Serializable>
Result of a remote call
SaveCommonObjective
Copy of a common objective as a serializable record
SavePlayer
Copy of a player as a serializable record
SaveState
Copy of the game state as a serializable record
SaveTableTop
Copy of the tabletop as a serializable record
Score
A score in the final score board
ScoreBoard
Class to construct a serializable scoreboard Construct it by giving the `Game` object from which to build the scoreboard, and send it over network to the clients
ScoreBoard.VictoryType
 
SelectLobbyOptions
Options to ask what to do in the lobby selection
Server
 
Server
Record to store the server ip and port
ServerDisconnectedException
ServerDisconnectedException is used to throw an exception when the server is disconnected from the client.
ServerEvent<T extends Serializable>
Class to represent an event sent by the server to the clients.
ServerEvent.Type
Enum to represent the type of the event.
Service
Services that can be called on the server
Shelf
Class that represents the shelf of a player It holds the cards that the player has placed on the shelf.
ShelvesController
Controller class for the shelves scene showing the four shelves of the players.
TableTop
Class that holds information about the tabletop.
Update
Update class is used to send the updated game information from the server to the clients.
Utils
Utility class for the CLI IO To use do: `Utils utils = new Utils();` and once you have the network manager: `utils.setNetworkManager(networkManager);` this is needed, because we want to return the control to the CLI if an event arrived.
Utils
 
WrongParametersException
Exception thrown when the parameters of a method are not the expected ones
WrongServiceException
Exception thrown when a service doesn't exist or cannot be called in the current context
